channel.title: How to configure whonix-gw to use snowflake?
channel.description: I'm using Qubes 4. I really need to use snowflake since that's basically the only thing that can work in my work network (right now I'm writing this using a qubes vm with tor browser alpha - not whonix so not the best thing out there from the security standpoint). I can get snowflake-client and move it to whonix-gw but what do I need to do after?

item.title: How to configure whonix-gw to use snowflake?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
